Structs/Exchange/ExchangeError.html#/s:1.name: decodeError
Structs/Exchange/ExchangeError.html#/s:1.abstract: Thrown when unable to decode an Exchange representation

Structs/Exchange/ExchangeError.html#/s:1.name: noRateError
Structs/Exchange/ExchangeError.html#/s:1.abstract: Thrown when there is no exchage rate for a particular Currency

Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.name: Rate
Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.abstract: Represents a monetary exchange rate between two currencies. Rounded to six decimal places.

Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.name: base
Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.abstract: The base currency for this Exchange. The currency to which all rates from this exchange are based upon.

Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.name: rates
Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.abstract: A dictionary of Currency values to Rate values where the Rate is the exchange rate between the base Currency and the queried Currency.

Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.name: init(base:rates:)
Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.abstract: Creates a new Exchange from a base Currency and a collection of exchange rates.

Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.name: init(from:)
Structs/Exchange.html#/s:16MonetaryExcha.abstract: An Exchange can be decoded directly from a standard standard Fixer.io Latest Rates JSON response.

Structs/Exchange.html.name: Exchange
Structs/Exchange.html.abstract: Exchange provides exchange rates between currencies. It can also convert MonetaryAmount values into
